Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails. Review the day’s agenda.
Conduct the compliance training for all relevant personnel. Ensure all employees attend and participate in the training.
Address any questions or concerns raised by employees during the compliance training. Make sure all employees understand the material. Distribute survey after training.
Lunch break - grab lunch with @QRES_2 and @QRES_3 to celebrate the completion of compliance training.
Collect feedback from the compliance training participants and use it to improve future training programs. Review survey results.
Follow up with Legal Counsel to confirm that all remaining compliance issues have been addressed and resolved. Review feedback on compliance procedures.
Document all compliance-related activities, including training, monitoring, and reporting. Create a log of all compliance-related communications.
Review the week's accomplishments and plan for the upcoming week. Update the project plan with any necessary changes.
Prepare a summary of the week's compliance activities for the Chief Operating Officer. @PEOPLE: COO_1. Topic: Weekly Compliance Update
End of day. Prepare for the weekend and head home.
